name: Book API Dev
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; cd ${containerWorkspaceFolder} && ( test -f .envrc || cp .envrc.example .envrc ) && direnv allow && direnv exec . task init'
postStartCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; cd ${containerWorkspaceFolder} && direnv exec . task db:up && direnv exec . task db:wait && direnv exec . task doctor'
